tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
quoteText: Any ideas, suggestions, and feedback about Reddit or our Services that you provide to us are entirely voluntary, and you agree that Reddit may use such ideas, suggestions, and feedback without compensation or obligation to you.
